TopicTitle: "Infinite Electricity" does not affect electricity usage by Ion Engines, but "Infinite Propellant" does

Articles.Content:
Just the title.

Severity: low

Repeatability: high

Process: Have an Ion Engine on your craft and turn on Infinite Electricity

I ran into this issue yesterday while trying to test time warp. Is it just for ions? I also noticed that reloading save where electricity cheat is on, just switches back to off. 

Edit:

Probe core was also slapped on, and it was sucking juice as well

Edited May 12, 2023 by cocoscacao
It might also be true for nuclear, I'll notify you when K2D2 is done with my current hour-long burn

12 hours ago, cocoscacao said:

Probe core was also slapped on, and it was sucking juice as well

This is affected by Infinite Electricity. Engines aren't, as electricity seems to be thought of as a fuel by the game's code when used by engines.
